content: the copenhagen cowl is a perfectly luxurious cowl in every way crocheted in a beautiful yet easy and relaxing v_stitch in gorgeous and buttery soft sock yarn it is both fabulous to make and wear subtle gradients of coral gray and cream allows the yarn to do all of the color changing for you this amazing cowl is truly a special treat for that extra special lightweight yarn you ve been saving **this pattern is free on the blog or you can purchase the ad-free pattern pdf here on ravelry ** need a little help there s a full video tutorial too
